class.name: Joint2D
class.brief_description: Base node for all joint constraints in 2D physics.
class.description: Base node for all joint constraints in 2D physics. Joints take 2 bodies and apply a custom constraint.

members.member: When [member node_a] and [member node_b] move in different directions the [code]bias[/code] controls how fast the joint pulls them back to their original position. The lower the [code]bias[/code] the more the two bodies can pull on the joint.
If [code]true[/code], the [PhysicsBody2D]s assigned to [member node_a] and [member node_b] will collide with each other.
The first [PhysicsBody2D] attached to the joint.
The second [PhysicsBody2D] attached to the joint.
